name: English trans-dev
tagline: Machine-corrected English translations of Greek and Latin works.
body:
#Welcome to english_trans-dev!

##About
This repository contains machine-corrected English translations of public-domain Greek and Latin works.

These XML files were produced by data entry company [Jouve](http://jouve.com/en), who OCR'd, corrected and encoded the texts in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards. While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
